title: Pls look at this post @Riot
body: Can i have 15 RP. I have 110 RP which is pretty much useless. Can i have 15RP so i can buy a chest. I already have 2 keys and a fragment. PLS PLS PLS PLS PLS PLS PLS PLS PLS PLS PLZZZZZZZZZZZZZ..... {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

replies.body: You can send your request through a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or tweet [@RiotSupport](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport).
Did it. Hopefully I get a reply. Im a gud kid. look at me Riot! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Chests are an atrociously poor use of RP. I strongly recommend you simply save your RP for a later date to partially pay for some skin you really want that has just been released or placed on sale.

Almost all players end up with a surplus of chests in the long run as key drop rates are incredibly low.

Even if you somehow had a surplus of keys and no way to gain more chests, 125 RP could only really earn you 1/3 of a mystery skin which are already of dubious quality. And it could very easily amount to less than that.

I know. But i rly dont buy Rp. I used a bit of it for ip or exp boost for a day.
And all im left with is 110 RP which is pretty useless. Thats why
